sections.heading: in actions on claims not due; judgment; when rendered
sections.text: The plaintiff in such action shall not have judgment on his claim before it becomes due, and the proceedings on attachment may be conducted without delay.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 242, p. 433;R.S.1913, ยง 7783;C.S.1922, ยง 8727;C.S.1929, ยง 20-1054;R.S
